about_the_game:
Snapback is the ultimate speedrunning puzzle platformer. It takes place in a dystopian world ruled by an authoritarian regime. You are a robotic citizen presented with the opportunity to fight against the oppressive system. A mysterious hacker gives you missions to rebel against the regime you live under. Each level presents a different challenge. Gameplay features a unique ability that allows you to traverse levels with careful teleports, only to be pulled back to that location after a set period. Every second counts. Speed is the puzzle.

Features:

Teleport - You have the ability to teleport instantly to any point you can see within range, but only for a period of time before you trigger a SnapBack.

Snapback - After teleporting, you will return to your previous location after a set period, traveling through space and colliding with everything between your current location and where you teleported from. This can also be triggered manually.

Punch - You can break objects, including, but not limited to, doors, windows, and enemies.

Movement - As a robot, you have an increased ability to move quickly through space and advanced servos to increase your ability to jump and traverse large distances.

Reset – To help facilitate speed runs and stumped puzzlers, you have the ability to reset a level at will to help get the best time possible.

Tier System – Our tier system scores the player based on performance while playing any given level. Try to reach S Tier in everything to achieve true mastery of the game.
detailed_description:
Snapback is the ultimate speedrunning puzzle platformer. It takes place in a dystopian world ruled by an authoritarian regime. You are a robotic citizen presented with the opportunity to fight against the oppressive system. A mysterious hacker gives you missions to rebel against the regime you live under. Each level presents a different challenge. Gameplay features a unique ability that allows you to traverse levels with careful teleports, only to be pulled back to that location after a set period. Every second counts. Speed is the puzzle.

Features:

Teleport - You have the ability to teleport instantly to any point you can see within range, but only for a period of time before you trigger a SnapBack.

Snapback - After teleporting, you will return to your previous location after a set period, traveling through space and colliding with everything between your current location and where you teleported from. This can also be triggered manually.

Punch - You can break objects, including, but not limited to, doors, windows, and enemies.

Movement - As a robot, you have an increased ability to move quickly through space and advanced servos to increase your ability to jump and traverse large distances.

Reset – To help facilitate speed runs and stumped puzzlers, you have the ability to reset a level at will to help get the best time possible.

Tier System – Our tier system scores the player based on performance while playing any given level. Try to reach S Tier in everything to achieve true mastery of the game.
name: Snapback

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 8th-gen or AMD Ryzen 3 3000 Series
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 or Radeon R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Snapback is a Speed-Runner Puzzle Platformer set in a robot dystopia where you are recruited to rebel against the evil GovCorp overlords, break the rules, and join the resistance!
